public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

This Class runs the Monopoly Game.

areSure

public boolean areSure()
Asks the player to doublecheck a major decision with a YES_NO JOptionPane.

Parameters:
player - The Player who is making decisions
Returns:
A boolean true = yes they still want to do it and false = no change their mind
